list.headline: Encounters with involvement of our empire
list.explanation: This page lists all encounters that we have participated in. Encounters are always sorted by turn descending. Encounters you haven't read are marked with a darker background.
list.none: No encounters have happened so far.
list.starOwner: Star was owned by {name} before the encounter occured.

details.headline: Encounter Details
details.explanation: Use the play/pause buttons to view what's happend in this encounter, or check specific turns by clicking on the appropriate turn. Click on 'Stop' resets the turn back to 0.
